solution_line_template: The number of women in the group is {women_per_child_multiplier} women/child * {children_count} children = <<{women_per_child_multiplier}*{children_count}={women_count}>>{women_count} women.
The number of men in the group is {men_per_woman_multiplier} men/woman * {women_count} women = <<{men_per_woman_multiplier}*{women_count}={men_count}>>{men_count} men.
The total number of people in the group is {men_count} men + {women_count} women + {children_count} children = <<{men_count}+{women_count}+{children_count}={total_people}>>{total_people} people.
